label: Map of the Village of Yonkers

metadata.label: Abstract
metadata.value: Shows roads, land owners, and land features.

metadata.label: Map Details
metadata.value:
Hudson River
Buildings
Albany Post Road or New York to Albany Post Road
Railroads
Saw Mill River

Factories

metadata.label: Corporate Name
metadata.value:
Hudson River Railroad
Baldwin & Waring's Hat body Factory
J.T. Waring Hat Factory

metadata.label: Format
metadata.value: map on paper on linen; color, 22 in. x 34 in.; scale: 300 ft. to an inch

metadata.label: Contact Information
metadata.value: 2199 Saw Mill River Road, Elmsford, NY 10523; 914.231.1500; http://archives.westchestergov.com

metadata.label: Digitization Specifications
metadata.value: Archival TIFF - Zeutchel OS 10000, Omniscan 11, Adobe Photoshop CS3, 400 dpi, 24 bit color, no compression; JPG2000 - enhanced for web
